name: Childhood Ride (MiniLD #68)
description:
I tried to recreate a game I was playing in the car when I was a kid. Although I didn't manage to include all the rules in time, it kinda respects the core aspect.

As it was a "mental" game, the possibilities were indeed endless. I could change rules, add obstacles and most importantly.. played in rhythm with the radio (or CD's) music. I didn't want to make another rhythm game with synchro issues so I keep things simple. But the hard mode is quite a challenge I must say :o

-----

You just need a mouse on PC (although left and right arrows are recommended for moving your head).

Also playable on smartphone & tablets, normally.

-----

Made for MiniLD #68 in one week: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-68/?action=previ...

Organised by @tinyworlds: http://ludumdare.com/compo/2016/06/13/minild-68-an...
